The Wilds is a group of four novels written by various authors. Each novel was published by Wizards of the Coast in 2009.
The books are
# The Fanged Crown by Jenna Helland (January 2009)
# The Restless Shore by James P. Davis (May 2009)
# The Edge of Chaos by Jak Koke (August 2009)
# Wrath of the Blue Lady by Mel Odom (December 2009)
